Mazen Alotaibi is a M.S. student under the advisor of Prof. Fuxin Li at Deep Machine Vision (DMV) in Oregon State University (OSU). He is interested in computer vision, deep learning, and data science. He works on projects on GitHub and participates in Kaggle competitions to distract him from academia. You can connect with him on LinkedIn or contact him via Email.

News

  • [2020-2-15] Got admitted in the Master's Program at Oregon State University for Fall 2020.
